name: @nimblebraininc/text-utils
description: Text manipulation toolkit with reverse, case conversion, slugify, URL extraction, truncation, and token counting

tools.name: reverse_text
tools.description: Reverse the characters in a text string

tools.name: text_info
tools.description: Analyze a text string: word count, character breakdown, line count

tools.name: transform_case
tools.description: Convert text between case formats (snake_case, camelCase, kebab-case, etc.)

tools.name: slugify
tools.description: Convert text into a URL-safe slug

tools.name: extract_urls
tools.description: Extract all URLs from a block of text

tools.name: truncate
tools.description: Truncate text at a word boundary with a configurable suffix

tools.name: count_tokens
tools.description: Estimate the token count for a text string
